name: Stick Man Brawl
description:
Hi everyone this is an early version of my game Stick Man Brawl!

This game is a 2D two player pixel fighting game where two stickman fight using pistols while jumping between platforms! This gam is still a prototype and i would love some feedback!

Controls:

Player1 - Black Stickman

W - Jump

A - Move Left

D -Move Right

Space - Shoot

Player2 - Blue Stickman

Left arrow key - Move Left

Right arrow key - Move Left

Up arrow key - Jump

Right Control - Shoot

NOTE: For best experience play in fullscreen!
